title: Santa Ynez Valley ?Scarecrow Fest? Underway
text:
Santa Ynez Valley “Scarecrow Fest” Underway Businesses compete Oct. 9 - Nov. 9 in Ballard, Buellton, Los Alamos, Los Olivos, Santa Ynez and Solvang John Palminteri , KEYT - KCOY - KKFX Senior Reporter, johnp1250@aol.com POSTED: 02:36 PM PDT Oct 12, 2015 UPDATED: 02:43 PM PDT Oct 12, 2015 Tweet SANTA YNEZ VALLEY, Calif. - 
The Santa Ynez Valley has fall characters, stuffed, and decorated for the next month as part of the annual Scarecrow Festival.Businesses are in a friendly competition, but in reality, with the amount of effort and artwork put in the scarecrows, it's clear some designers are serious about winning the ultimate title at the end of the promotion.The crows or some variation of them can be found propped up in from of businesses in Ballard, Buellton, Los Alamos, Los Olivos, Santa Ynez and Solvang.The valley fits the scarecrow event in with many other activities including the Celebration of Harvest which drew thousands over the past weekend, at area wineries and the main event at Mission Santa Inez.Upcoming will be the Buellton Real Men Cook October 17, Buellton Wine and Chili Festival October 25 and Halloween street fairs.
